sqlGroup.name: system_role
sqlGroup.sql: select role.*, p.name as pname from system_role as role left join system_role p on role.pid=p.id
select role.* from system_user as u join system_user_role as user_role on u.id = user_role.user_id join system_role as role on role.id= user_role.role_id where u.id=?
select role.name from system_user as u join system_user_role as user_role on u.id = user_role.user_id join system_role as role on role.id= user_role.role_id where u.name=?
